long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ChatGPT Search Extension — your gateway to a more streamlined and controlled search experience with ChatGPT! Unlike conventional search engines, ChatGPT doesn't inherently support query searches, but with this extension, you can now effortlessly search using queries, bringing a new level of precision to your interactions.

Main Features:

🔍 Query Search: Take command of your searches with direct queries, offering unparalleled control over the information you seek. No more sifting through irrelevant results—get exactly what you want with ease.

🔑 No OpenAI API Key Required: Enjoy hassle-free access to ChatGPT without the need for an OpenAI API key. The extension seamlessly integrates with the regular ChatGPT website, ensuring a smooth and user-friendly experience from the moment you initiate a search.

📌 Tooltip on Select: Elevate your browsing experience with insightful tooltips that appear when selecting text on web pages. Gain quick and valuable insights without the need to leave your current page.

📜 List of Prompts: Unlock a curated list of prompts designed to ignite inspiration and fuel creativity. Whether you're seeking a starting point for a conversation or looking to spark new ideas, this feature has you covered.

🎨 Customizable Tooltip: Tailor the extension to suit your preferences by customizing tooltips. Choose to display or hide tooltips on Google searches or text selections, putting you in complete control of your browsing environment.

Happy GPTing!
